root: ^An Open Source Unity Visual Novel framework made with Ink.
^My name is Erin and I'll teach you how to work with this framework quickly!

Introduction: ^Bungaku is a Visual Novel framework built above Inky, a narrative scripting language.
^This framework provide basic functionality to make Visual Novel type game, so you don't have to make a fully functional system from scratch just to make a Visual Nove game.
^Hassle worry, just make a good story!
Credits: ^Bungaku is made by a fellow Weeb named Bayu Satiyo.
